snippet: AT&T issued a news release notifying users of its phone service that, in affected areas, it was waiving extra charges for customers who exceed their voice and text limit through the end of November.
abstract: Connecticut continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: AT&T issued a news release notifying users of its phone service that, in affected areas, it was waiving extra charges for customers who exceed their voice and text limit through the end of November.

headline.seo: Updates on Service Restoration in Connecticut
